# sling.workflow

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of sling.workflow is to facilitate data analysis workflow of the SLING lab projects.

## Installation

The package is for internal use only. You can install it from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("zawmtun/sling.workflow")
```
